dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of moving 2D chair images superimposed on natural background images, used for training optical flow estimation models.

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated from a large pool of rendering assets, consisting of sequences of images for optical flow estimation.

J. Wulff

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset derived from an open-source 3D animated short film, designed to encourage the development of methods that use longer sequences.
dcterms:title: Sintel

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: A realistic dataset obtained by annotating dynamic scenes from the KITTI raw data collection, used for evaluating optical flow estimation methods.

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes stereo and flow ground truth with uncertainties for urban autonomous driving, designed for evaluating optical flow methods.
